content.description: The route follows a dike up the ridge past 2 roofs and finishes on a slab.  Can rap route with 60m rope or go off the east side anchors and TR Bat Crack.
content.protection: 4 bolts set of nuts and cams .5, .75, #1 Camelot.  Large nut nice after 2nd bolt. Bolted anchors
content.location: From the main area parking lot go right (south east) toward a gully separating Condor dome and the Thunder Dome (main formation)

content.description: Large dome to the south of the main area with an impressive short overhang on the west side leading to a long slab. The east side has varied quality of rock but would clean up nice. (there are no actual Condors in the area)
